introduction.title: About us
introduction.description: Viblo is a platform for technical knowledge sharing
introduction.contents: Currently, we are applying different Machine Learning, Deep Learning approaches, as well as, state-of-the-art Natural Language Processing techniques to our services on Viblo. However, we donâ€™t want to limit our service just inside Viblo platform. In the near future, we will expand our current services to stand-alone applications.

how_work.title: How do our services work?
how_work.description:
Are you curious about our services?
This is how we did it.

labels.enter_your_code: Please enter the code that you want to test
labels.enter_your_tag: Enter your tag's name which you want to find the same tags
labels.enable_markdown_syntax: The document is writen in Markdown syntax

messages.is_not_spam: Your document is type of {type}. It's not spam.
messages.language_of_post: The language of the post is {type}

programming_language_detection.name: Programming language detection
programming_language_detection.contents: Our service is capable of automatically identifying the programming language that is in-use. With the detected programming language, we can highlight the code, as well as, put it in the proper format...

spam_detection.name: Spam detection
spam_detection.description: Identify whether a post is spam or not
spam_detection.contents: We train the spam detector with about 15000 labeled posts from Viblo, news, and advertisements as well. The accuracy of our spam detector is reported to be extremely high (99.7%) and the processing time is impressively low (ms).

tag_compare.name: Tag compare
tag_compare.description: Find tags which have the same meaning
tag_compare.contents: Our service can automatically find tags which have the same meanings. The training data are technical posts from Viblo platforms and their corresponding tags.

auto_tagging.name: Auto tagging
auto_tagging.description: Automatically find relevant tags for a post
auto_tagging.contents: We train the auto-tagging model with a large number of posts from Viblo which contain a lot of technical keywords. After the training phase is done, we can use it to find relevant tags for a given post.

language_detection.name: Language detection
language_detection.description: Detect the language of a post
language_detection.contents: We employ the Graph-based N-Gram technique and other methods for handling Unicode characters to detect language written in a post. With the detected language, we can help Viblo users to find suitable posts to their need. Besides that, our language detector can effectively aid Elasticsearch engine to achieve more accurate results.

recommendation_system.name: Recommendation system
recommendation_system.description: Automatically recommend relevant posts on Viblo for users
recommendation_system.contents: Up to now, there are many technical posts on Viblo (over 20K posts of about 100 different subjects), and the number of posts tends to increase very rapidly. As such, users often encounter the problem of information overload; users usually find it difficult to find suitable posts to their need. Therefore, a recommendation system has been built in order to suggest relevant technical posts on Viblo for users based on their interest.

plagiarism_detection.name: Plagiarism detection
plagiarism_detection.contents: With a huge numbers of published technical posts, we has to cope with the problem of plagiarism. We don't want the content of a published post is a copy-paste work. Because of that, we aim to build a system which is capable of detecting plagiarism automatically. After that, the integrity of a post can be easily verified.

more.name: More services later...
more.description: Come back later for more awesome services
